titles.title: Veteran Vocational Rehabilitation and Employment Subsistence Allowance Improvement Act of 2009

To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an increase in the amount of subsistence allowance payable by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to veterans participating in vocational rehabilitation programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E50)
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
